actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Fund Act (Act of June 26, 1948, 62 Stat. 1052).

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Fund Act to authorize appropriations from the reclamation fund for an emergency fund to pay the expenses the Commissioner of Water and Power Resources Service (under present law the Commissioner of Reclamation) determines are required to assure continuous operation of all projects and project facilities governed by Federal reclamation laws.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Fund Act (Act of June 26, 1948, 62 Stat. 1052).
